LanguageData.Chickennest.label: 小动物巢
LanguageData.Chickennest.description: A small nest for animals to sleep in. Fits smaller animals like chickens, cats, or small dogs.

LanguageData.AnimalPillow.label: 动物软巢
LanguageData.AnimalPillow.description: Millenium Line animal bed. Rest and treat your furry friends comfortably on the pillow. Pet hair repellent and easy to clean.
